moves.name: Bitter Blade
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Poltergeist
moves.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
moves.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

moves.name: Protect
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

moves.name: Endure
moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Tera Blast
moves.desc: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type. In addition, if the user's Tera Type is Stellar, this move has 100 power, is super effective against Terastallized targets and neutral against other targets, and lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.desc: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
moves.shortDesc: Copies the target's current stat stages.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.desc: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
moves.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Solar Blade
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.desc: Burns the target.
moves.shortDesc: Burns the target.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Ally Switch
moves.desc: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Ally Switch.
moves.shortDesc: User and ally swap positions; using again can fail.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Hex
moves.desc: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

moves.name: Disable
moves.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
moves.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
moves.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

moves.name: Throat Chop
moves.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
moves.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the foe(s).

moves.name: Taunt
moves.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
moves.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Ember
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Destroys the foe(s) Berry/Gem.

moves.name: Curse
moves.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
moves.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

moves.name: Vacuum Wave
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

moves.name: Rest
moves.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
moves.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

moves.name: Facade
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Fling
moves.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.
